title: WTB  off center t206 fronts, bad ones
author: Phillies*phan

posts.post_title: WTB  off center t206 fronts, bad ones
posts.post_content: Dig up all your badly centered t206's.  I want em.  I'm talking 90/10 side to side and no names at the bottom.  Condition really doesn't matter.  Send scans to [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]
